title: Headhunter Caitlyn missing "headshot readied" animation/sound.
body:
As title. When you fire your sixth shot and her Headshot passive is primed, Caitlyn's classic and Sherrif skins at least (likely others too) have an animation and a sound effect to signify she's all ready to headshot.

The Headhunter Caitlyn skin doesn't have a clear animation or sound effect to signify she's ready to headshot.

replies.body:
Hey Elphege - 

I just loaded her up, and I was able to hear the proper sound and see the proper effects. Out of curiosity, did you have a Caitlyn on the enemy team?

Hello Katey.

I made this thread before patch 6.9 and its notes dropped, actually. When the notes became available a few hours after posting this, I noticed it was among the bug fixes, so you guys probably already knew about it and fixed it. 

I appreciate the response, though.

Just to check, I went in-game and it does have an effect and satisfying sound effect. Feels like the classic may be flashier, but that may just be being so used to classic and only recently getting Headhunter from Hextech.

Cheers!
